title: Queen of the Shining Sea
description: Rielle and her friends patrol the Shining Sea, doing all they can to stem the tide of gold flowing into Magehold and the dangerous goods flowing out. Facing Immortals and pirates at every turn, they wage battle after battle in an effort to weaken its ability to grasp for power.But Magehold does not accept defeatâ€”and when it strikes back, Emaurria will suffer the consequences...
author: Miranda Honfleur
